name: The Point One Percent
description:
Made for The Ludum Dare 38 game jam.

You're part of a Pill strike force, sent on a mission into someone's body. But this mission might just be your last...or something, as I write this, it's 3am. I just want to sleep... Won't you let me sleep!

The "gameplay" is inspired but the likes of Hotline miami and Metal Gear Solid, except it's microscopic. SMALL WORLD! Get it? *tired.

This was our first PROPER go at a game jam and while we are very tired, and really didn't have much time, the fact we have a game to show for it is incredible. We hope you enjoy it.

Made in: Game Maker Studio 2.
